content: द्रष्टव्य {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} [दृश्-तव्य] {@--1@} To be seen, visible. {@--2@} Perceptible. {@--3@} Fit to be seen, investigated, or examined. {@--4@} Lovely, pleasing to the sight, beautiful; त्वया द्रष्टव्यानां परं न दृष्टं <ls>Ś. 2</ls>; <ls>Bh. 1. 8.</ls> {@--5@} To be understood. {@--6@} To be regarded or considered as.
